vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Gad living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness, only mentioned at Gen.46.16;
son of: Gad (H1410);
brother of: Haggi (H2291), Shuni (H7764), Ezbon (H0675), Eri (H6179), Arod (H0720) and Areli (H0692); also called Zephon at Num.26.15;
§ Ziphion = "lookout"
1) a son of Gad and progenitor of the family of Zephonites
1a) also 'Zephon'
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
洗非芸 这个陽性專有名詞 人名在希伯來文的意思是 "警戒"
1) 迦得的眾子之一, 洗分家族的創始人 (創46:16)
1a) 又稱 '洗分', 見 [6827] [6831]
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
洗非芸 这个阳性专有名词 人名在希伯来文的意思是 "警戒"
1) 迦得的众子之一, 洗分家族的创始人 (创46:16)
1a) 又称 '洗分', 见 [6827] [6831]
